    • Method Detail

      • stopAll

        void stopAll()
        Stops all sounds.

      • stop

        void stop(int channel)
        See Also:
        stop(int, int)

      • stop

        void stop(int channel,
          int fadeOutMillis)
        Stops the sound playing in the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The sound channel to stop.
        fadeOutMillis - Instead of stopping the sound immediately, fade it out slowly over the course of fadeOutMillis.

      • get

        ISound get(int channel)
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to request the contents of.
        Returns:
        The sound in the specified channel, or null if none exists.

      • getMasterVolume

        double getMasterVolume(SoundType type)
        Returns:
        The master volume for the specified type.
        See Also:
        setMasterVolume(SoundType, double)

      • isPaused

        boolean isPaused()
        See Also:
        setPaused(boolean)

      • getFreeChannel

        int getFreeChannel()
        Returns a currently unused sound channel.

      • set

        void set(int channel,
         ISound sound)
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel to store the sound in. If a sound is already in that slot, that sound is stopped first.
        sound - The sound object to store.

      • setMasterVolume

        void setMasterVolume(SoundType type,
                     double volume)
        Changes the master volume for the specified type. The master volume is multiplied together with the sound's private volume to get the final playback volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The master volume between 0.0 and 1.0.

      • setPaused

        void setPaused(boolean p)
        Pauses or unpauses this sound state. Any sounds that are/were already paused are left alone.
